ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] problem while crawling SSL sites
ygData.msgSnippet: What version of Heritrix are you using? We had heaps of issues with Heritrix 3.3 capturing SSL. The upstream proxy server couldn t understand the requests. We

What version of Heritrix are you using? We had heaps of issues with Heritri=
x 3.3 capturing SSL. The upstream proxy server couldn't understand the requ=
ests. We dropped back to 3.2 which worked fine. Looking at the source code =
the SSL fetcher code is quite different in 3.3 from 3.2.

------ Original m=
essage------
From: wolfree@... [archive-crawler]
Date: Thu, 27 Apr 2017=
 4:05 AM
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com;
Cc:
Subject:[archive-crawler]=
 problem while crawling SSL sites

04 with oracle java8. I got one out of 10 installations working with ssl bu=
t I have no clue WHY it is working, because the binaries and everything see=
ms to be the same ...

Anyone got that problem, too?


Cheers
